content.rendered:
LOCATED OFF WINNIE MANDELA DRIVE, DAINFERN, MIDRAND. TAKE YOUR NEXT STEP AT HELDERFONTEIN NEXUS

Come home to Helderfontein Nexus Lifestyle Apartments, located off Winnie Mandela Drive (ex William Nicol Drive) in Dainfern, Gauteng. These apartments are available in 1-, 2- & 3-bedroom layouts and boast designer fittings and finishes. Take occupation from 1 June 2025. Residents can enjoy FREE internet, access to the fully-equipped gym, swimming pool, kids’ play parks, braai facilities, private clubhouse, FREE Padel court, multi-purpose sports field and more! Each apartment also has backup solar power as well as water backup solutions. 

Contact Celia
Contact Thandazani
BROCHURE
ESTATE LOCATION
ESTATE RULES

ESTATE FEATURES

3-bed, 2-bed and two 1-bed apartments for rent
Sizes range from 34m² – 83m²
Rent from R6,900pm – R13,800pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet access in each apartment
Solar backup and gas hobs
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Heated Swimming Pool
Splash Zone
Padel Court
Action Soccer Field

INDOOR FACILITIES

Clubhouse
Fully-Equipped Gym
Meeting Room

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

HELDERFONTEIN NEXUS IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
